channel.title: For those of you who are upset about the L4D 2/no Episode Three news
channel.description:
[url]https://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=887255[/url]
Please sign this petition if you agree. Instead of raising negative attention, the idea is to bring the community together. If we get enough signatures, I will email this to Valve.
Also, if you know effective ways of gathering people to sign, any help would be appreciated.

item.title: For those of you who are upset about the L4D 2/no Episode Three news
item.dc:creator: Soup
item.description:
~kev~:

It looks like they are taking left 4 dead in the same direction of the corny looking tf2. I dont mind the no news on EP. 3, its the direction it looks like l4d is going that bothers me. l4d does not need to be a zombie mod for team fortress 2. And that is what it looks like.

Silly troll, opinions are for people with intelligence!

Read full topic

item.title: For those of you who are upset about the L4D 2/no Episode Three news
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
I’m glad that if they don’t show a trailer, then they don’t show content in it that won’t be in the game. And the less I hear people complaining about cut content or saying how much better X would be if it were Y, the happier I am.

Read full topic
item.source: For those of you who are upset about the L4D 2/no Episode Three news

item.title: For those of you who are upset about the L4D 2/no Episode Three news
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
I don’t care about EP3 lack of media. They can release it in five years without infos and I still buy it. I made the same thing for HL2.
If valve release new awesome games in the middle, that’s a good thing.
Oh and remember : you all have a real life to carry on a,d plenty of other good games before EP3…

Read full topic

item.title: For those of you who are upset about the L4D 2/no Episode Three news
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Level:

They aren’t fixed in their spot, Valve completely decides who does that and when.

Apparently it’s the employees themselves who decide what they’d like to work on. L4D2 is monopolising the staff because they’re all really excited about it.

Read full topic

item.title: For those of you who are upset about the L4D 2/no Episode Three news
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
Patonki:

Just popping up here to tell you that valve has different teams working on L4D2, Ep.3, Portal 3, ect.

Yes, but they do allocate people between teams, depending on what they want to get done, I’d guess that L4D2 has the majority of the people ATM, where Ep3 and Portal 2 have less, and when L4D2 nears completion, they’ll shuffle more people back in the direction of EP3 and portal 2.

They aren’t fixed in their spot, Valve completely decides who does that and when.

Read full topic
item.source: For those of you who are upset about the L4D 2/no Episode Three news
